extensionDescription.message: Ring a bell every half hour in a pattern used on ships.

buttonNow.description: Button to test the bell now

muteLegend.description: Button group to mute the bell

muteNext.description: Button to mute next series of strikes

muteWatch.description: Button to mute strikes until end of this watch (4 hour period)

mutePermanent.description: Button to mute strikes until manually enabled again

notificationLegend.description: Controls group to select method of notifying when the bell is struck

notificationBoth.description: Play sound and show notification when bell is struck

notificationSound.description: Only play sound when bell is struck
